nodes.text: The Cantonica Zephyr GB-134 speeder, also known as the Canto Bight Police Speeder the GB-134 pursuit craft‎‎, or informally as jet-sticks, was a pursuit speeder used by Canto Bight Police officers on the planet Cantonica.

A swift and lightweight pursuit craft, The GB-134 was controlled by the pilot shifting his weight, and accelerating and braking with hand-throttles and foot peddles, with the GB-134 easily zooming through large crowds and chasing down runaway criminals. Though the craft's variable setting laser cannons were typically set to stun, they could be dialed up to lethal intensity.
